Button.Name: Initialize
Button.OnPress:
show_window Custom.DrumsUI_XPSettings
sBar1=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Left sBar2=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Top sBar3=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Width sBar4=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Height sBar5=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Right
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.AdventureXP.top=Parent.Layout.LocBar')##(sBar1) Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.Layout.Bar')##(sBar1)##('=AdventureXP') Parent.DoCommand.press=true
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.AchievementXP.top=Parent.Layout.LocBar')##(sBar2) Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.Layout.Bar')##(sBar2)##('=AchievementXP') Parent.DoCommand.press=true
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.TradeskillXP.top=Parent.Layout.LocBar')##(sBar3) Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.Layout.Bar')##(sBar3)##('=TradeskillXP') Parent.DoCommand.press=true
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.TitheXP.top=Parent.Layout.LocBar')##(sBar4) Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.Layout.Bar')##(sBar4)##('=TitheXP') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.AscensionXP.right=Parent.Layout.LocBar')##(sBar5) Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.Layout.Bar')##(sBar5)##('=AscensionXP') Parent.DoCommand.press=true

Button.Name: SaveOrder
Button.OnPress: window_property unlock Custom DrumsUI_XPSettings Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Left=Parent.AdventureXP.sOrder Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Top=Parent.AchievementXP.sOrder Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Width=Parent.TradeskillXP.sOrder Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Height=Parent.TitheXP.sOrder Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_XPSettings.Right=Parent.AscensionXP.sOrder window_property lock Custom DrumsUI_XPSettings

Page.Name: AdventureXP
Page.OnMove:
sOrder=1
sCheck1=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar1) sOrder=(sCheck1 ? '1' : sOrder) sCheck2=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar2) sOrder=(sCheck2 ? '2' : sOrder) sCheck3=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar3) sOrder=(sCheck3 ? '3' : sOrder) sCheck4=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar4) sOrder=(sCheck4 ? '4' : sOrder) sCheck5=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar5) sOrder=(sCheck5 ? '5' : sOrder)

Text.Name: XPDebt
Text.OnTextChanged: sCheck1=(Text == '0.0%') sCheck2=(Text == '0%') sCheck3=(sCheck1 || sCheck2) size1=(0,0) size2=(36,16) size=(sCheck3? size1 : size2)

Page.Name: AchievementXP
Page.OnMove:
sOrder=2
sCheck1=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar1) sOrder=(sCheck1 ? '1' : sOrder) sCheck2=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar2) sOrder=(sCheck2 ? '2' : sOrder) sCheck3=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar3) sOrder=(sCheck3 ? '3' : sOrder) sCheck4=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar4) sOrder=(sCheck4 ? '4' : sOrder) sCheck5=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar5) sOrder=(sCheck5 ? '5' : sOrder)

Text.Name: AAUnspent
Text.OnTextChanged: sCheck=(Text == '0') size1=(0,0) size2=(24,16) size=(sCheck? size1 : size2)

Page.Name: TradeskillXP
Page.OnMove:
sOrder=3
sCheck1=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar1) sOrder=(sCheck1 ? '1' : sOrder) sCheck2=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar2) sOrder=(sCheck2 ? '2' : sOrder) sCheck3=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar3) sOrder=(sCheck3 ? '3' : sOrder) sCheck4=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar4) sOrder=(sCheck4 ? '4' : sOrder) sCheck5=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar5) sOrder=(sCheck5 ? '5' : sOrder)

Text.Name: TSDebt
Text.OnTextChanged: sCheck1=(Text == '0.0%') sCheck2=(Text == '0%') sCheck3=(sCheck1 || sCheck2) size1=(0,0) size2=(36,16) size=(sCheck3? size1 : size2)

Page.Name: TitheXP
Page.OnMove:
sOrder=4
sCheck1=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar1) sOrder=(sCheck1 ? '1' : sOrder) sCheck2=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar2) sOrder=(sCheck2 ? '2' : sOrder) sCheck3=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar3) sOrder=(sCheck3 ? '3' : sOrder) sCheck4=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar4) sOrder=(sCheck4 ? '4' : sOrder) sCheck5=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar5) sOrder=(sCheck5 ? '5' : sOrder)

Text.Name: UnspentDeity
Text.OnTextChanged: sCheck=(Text == '0') size1=(0,0) size2=(24,16) size=(sCheck? size1 : size2)

Page.Name: AscensionXP
Page.OnMove:
sOrder=5
sCheck1=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar1) sOrder=(sCheck1 ? '1' : sOrder) sCheck2=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar2) sOrder=(sCheck2 ? '2' : sOrder) sCheck3=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar3) sOrder=(sCheck3 ? '3' : sOrder) sCheck4=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar4) sOrder=(sCheck4 ? '4' : sOrder) sCheck5=(Top == Parent.Layout.LocBar5) sOrder=(sCheck5 ? '5' : sOrder)
